content: Wait, no — I mean, I'll keep you safe while we're out and about! <style=SizeSmall>The look Mobai just shot my way was... super duper wild...</style>

content: Congratulations on your new place, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! Swoosh~! Glenn says the PuffPost Box is incredible. {A笑哈哈}Anything'll fit inside it!

content: When you get your own car, I'll take you for a wild spin — a s-safe one, of course! <style=SizeSmall>Mobai just gave me a look... super duper wild...</style>

content: So I'm gonna send four double-door refrigerators to your PuffPost Box!{短暂停} Just kidding~! <style=NpcName>Mobai</style> seems to be waiting for you to explore the new house.

content: {A笑哈哈}I was just practicing saying, "I'm from <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style>," and it feels amazing. I'm so happy that I want to say it to everyone!

content: I swear on these boing-tastic ears of mine~, I'll show you what real danger — Ahem...

content: If you don't know what to do, just talk to Mobai. If you're looking to buy or sell goods, go see Glenn. {A得意}And if you're bored, just come see me!
info: 恭喜新家落成-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A灵光一现}PuffPost is seriously wild! You can get stuff delivered from light-years away, or send something to someone who's in the same area as you!
info: 恭喜新家落成-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: So there's no need to worry about ever missing your friends. PuffPost's got you covered! <style=SizeSmall>I mean, would your PuffPost Box explode if you've got too many friends?</style>
info: 恭喜新家落成-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本
